author: Press Association
title: Man in court charged with murdering man, 23, found dead on Christmas Eve - The Courier
text:
Man in court charged with murdering man, 23, found dead on Christmas Eve By Press Association December 28 2023, 7.40pm Share Man in court charged with murdering man, 23, found dead on Christmas Eve Share via Facebook Twitter Linkedin Whatsapp Messenger Email Post link https://www.thecourier.co.uk/news/uk-world/4852821/man-in-court-charged-with-murdering-man-23-found-dead-on-christmas-eve/ Copy Link William Bush has been remembered as ‘loyal, funny and caring’ (South Wales Police/PA)
A man has appeared in court charged with murder after the death of a 23-year-old man in Cardiff on Christmas Eve.
William Bush – described by relatives as “loyal, funny and caring” – was found with injuries at an address in Chapel Street at about 11.30am on Sunday, South Wales Police said.
Dylan Thomas, 23, of Llandaff, appeared at Cardiff Magistrates’ Court on Thursday.
He was remanded in custody to appear at Cardiff Crown Court on January 2.
In a statement after the hearing, the Bush family said: “This week our beloved Will was taken away from us in such a cruel and indescribable way.
“Will was such a loyal, funny and caring son, brother and boyfriend.
“We are absolutely devastated and as a family request that our privacy is respected at this difficult time.”

author: @iltempo_official
title: Ucraina, la promessa di Salvini: "Mai nostri figli a combattere e morire lì"
text:
Matteo Salvini: "Mai un figlio d'Italia a combattere in Ucraina"
“Mai, mai nel mio nome, e mai con l'ok della Lega, un solo figlio d'Italia a combattere e morire in Ucraina". Lo ha dichiarato il vicepremier e ministro dei Trasporti, Matteo Salvini, a margine della conferenza stampa di presentazione del Salone dell'Auto di Torino. "E penso che Macron, quando continua a ribadire questa possibilità, commette un errore gravissimo e sia una persona o in difficoltà o pericolosa", continua il leader della Lega, "stiamo aiutando l'Ucraina in ogni maniera possibile, con aiuti economici, umanitari, militari e sociali. Pensare di mandare i nostri figli a combattere e morire in Ucraina è folle”.

author: New Era staff
title: Report: State education funding falling behind | State | Kentucky New Era
text:
A new set of reports from the Council for Better Education (CBE) shows that Kentucky’s public education system is suffering from a steady decline in inflation-adjusted state funding since 2008.
The reports, released to every public school district in the state, indicate that while the SEEK (Support Education Excellence in Kentucky) formula distributes money fairly, the total amount allocated by the state is inadequate. As a result, school districts are grappling with funding shortfalls that affect staffing, class sizes, student services and transportation, according to a news release from CBE.

author: time news
title: Arsenal misses header, Tottenham slapped at Brigton - timenews
text: 2023-12-29 00:17:13 Couple Lucas Michel Published 45 minutes ago, Updated now Odegaard and his partners were defeated by the very compact Hammers. PETER CZIBORRA / REUTERS A successful Seagulls corrected Spurs while the Gunners were trapped at home by West Ham at the end of Boxing Day on Thursday evening. Successful in December, Tottenham fell back into their ways this Thursday at Brighton (4-2), at the end of Boxing Day in the Premier League. Mitigated by two late goals from Veliz (82nd) and Davies (86th), this rout prevents Spurs from climbing back into a top 4 abandoned in November after an idyllic start to the season. But this was the Tottenham of November, the one so easily overwhelmed in defense and so imprecise in attack. Or unlucky, like Richarlison, the man in good form in recent matches, who hit the post before having two goals refused for offside (46th, 62nd). Opposite, Brighton will therefore have benefited at great cost. First by the young Hinshelwood (12th), brilliantly served by the untenable Joao Pedro, author of a double on penalty (23rd, 76th), his favorite exercise. Enhanced by Estupinan’s missile (63rd), the Seagulls’ big success allows De Zerbi’s squad, despite having been suffering for two months, to move up to 8th place, with six Spurs units still as unpredictable. Frustrated by Areola, Arsenal misses the lead Later, the curiosity of the last meeting lay in the identity of the fall champion. Leader at Christmas, like last year, Arsenal had the opportunity to finish as autumn champions by winning against West Ham. Missed. Trapped at home by their London neighbor (0-2), the Gunners will have experienced an evening in line with their rival from north London. To a lesser extent, certainly, but the ambition was quite different. Except that the very solid West Ham team, having regained confidence for several months, decided otherwise. Showered by a first goal on the verge of Soucek (13th), the locals were picked up again on their return from the locker room, on a helmet strike from a veteran of the house (Mavropanos, 55th). #Arsenal #misses #header #Tottenham #slapped #Brigton

author: Fusion Fuel Green Public Limited Company - (GLOBE NEWSWIRE)
title: Fusion Fuel Receives Notification of IPCEI Approval from European Commission for 630 MW ... | News | bakersfield.com
text:
SABUGO, Portugal, Feb. 16, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fusion Fuel (NASDAQ: HTOO) (the “Company”) is pleased to announce that it has received notification from the European Commission that the Company’s HEVO-Portugal project was among 33 selected for approval under the Important Projects of Common European Interest (“IPCEI”) Hy2Infra program. The €650 million, 630 MW project is to be developed in Sines, Portugal, and would produce 62,000 tonnes of green hydrogen per annum. A portion of the green hydrogen is expected to be used in the production of green ammonia and exported from the Port of Sines to the Port of Rotterdam in the Netherlands. The balance would be consumed by industrial customers in the domestic Portuguese market.

author: 自由時報電子報
title: 無牌車占位占道 苗縣加強取締
text:
無牌車占位占道 苗縣加強取締
警方執行無牌車輛稽查工作，將針對路邊停車格、住宅騎樓人行道等道路範圍進行巡檢。（警方提供）
〔記者彭健禮／苗栗報導〕無牌車輛占用公共停車空間及道路的亂象惹人厭，但涉及交通、環保法規層面，處理棘手。苗栗縣政府邀相關單位召開研商會議，決議優先處理長期占用道路範圍及公有停車場的無牌車輛，警察局即日起持續加強查處，還縣民一個優質的停車空間與市容。
警察局交通隊表示，無牌車輛占用公共停車空間及道路，破壞停車秩序，影響其他用路人的權益。依據道路交通管理處罰條例規定，對於懸掛他車號牌或未懸掛號牌於道路停車者，可處三千六百元至一萬八百元罰鍰，車輛並當場移置保管及扣繳其牌照。
請繼續往下閱讀...
交通隊表示，無牌車輛稽查工作，將針對路邊停車格、住宅騎樓人行道等道路範圍進行巡檢，一經發現牌照違規車輛，即予舉發並當場移置保管車輛；若查為廢棄車輛者，則由環境保護局依「占用道路廢棄車輛認定基準及查報處理辦法」規定辦理。
環保局指出，民眾如發現無牌車或廢棄車占用道路、停車場，可利用「占用道路廢車通報系統」，或專線037-558558＃327、縣民熱線一九九九通報。
